announcements: /me Remember to click the star in the top bar to favorite this room!! http://i.imgur.com/sVTDetC.png
/me Come chill with us on our Discord server: https://discord.gg/XXQY4Tg
/me When DJing, remember that there is a 10 minute limit and songs with lyrics must be in English.
/me You can find a list of my commands here: https://git.io/vSKwT
/me We recommend RCS for autowooting and other fun features: https://rcs.radiant.dj/

messageCommands.changelog: /me You can find my changelog here: https://git.io/vSKw3
messageCommands.owner: /me My owner is a guy named George aka @N8te420!
messageCommands.rcs: /me We recommend RCS for autowooting and other fun features: https://rcs.radiant.dj/
messageCommands.fav: /me Remember to click the star in the top bar to favorite this room!! http://i.imgur.com/sVTDetC.png
messageCommands.discord: /me You can come and chill with us on discord: https://discord.gg/XXQY4Tg
messageCommands.dcinfo: /me Type !dc if you have recently disconnected to get your position on the waitlist back!
messageCommands.lottoinfo: /me Lotto is run every 30 mins, do !join to join when it starts. If you win you get first on the waitlist!
messageCommands.420: /me You can find a great strain database here: https://www.leafly.com/
messageCommands.ba: /me A Brand Ambassador is the voice of the plug.dj users. They promote events, engage the community and share the plug.dj message around the world. For more info: https://plug.dj/ba
messageCommands.android: /me You can download the Plug.dj App for Android here: https://plug.dj/android-site-alert
messageCommands.ios: /me You can download the Plug.dj App for iOS here: https://plug.dj/ios-site-alert

skipReasons.theme: this song does not fit the room theme.
skipReasons.op: this song is on the OP blacklist.
skipReasons.blacklisted: this song was found on a blacklist.
skipReasons.history: this song is already in the room's song history.
skipReasons.mix: you played a mix, which is against the rules.
skipReasons.sound: the song you played has bad sound quality, or no sound.
skipReasons.nsfw: the song you played contains NSFW imagery or sound.
skipReasons.unavailable: the song you played is not available for some users.
skipReasons.10min: the song you played is over 10 minutes.
skipReasons.language: the song you played was not in english.
skipReasons.repeat: you have been warned already, your spot wont be restored.
skipReasons.stuck: the song you played was stuck.

fortunes: Whatever your goals in life, embrace it visualize it, and for it will be yours.
Accept that some days you’re the pigeon, and some days you’re the statue.
A member of your family will soon do something that will make you proud.
A firm friendship will prove the foundation on your success in life.
There is a true and sincere friendship between you and your friends.
Be prepared to accept a wondrous opportunity in the days ahead!
Your great attention to detail is both a blessing and a curse.
You find beauty in ordinary things, do not lose this ability.
When everything’s coming your way, you’re in the wrong lane.
You learn from your mistakes... You will learn a lot today.
Your everlasting patience will be rewarded sooner or later.
If you want the rainbow, you must to put up with the rain.
If your desires are not extravagant they will be granted.
Pray for what you want, but work for the things you need.
An alien of some sort will be appearing to you shortly.
You will take a chance on something in the near future.
The man on the top of the mountain did not fall there.
Generosity and perfection are your everlasting goals.
You will inherit some money or a small piece of land.
Your ability to juggle many tasks will take you far.
Fame, riches and romance are yours for the asking.
A friend asks only for your time, not your money.
Don't ask, don't say. Everything lies in silence.
Smiling often can make you look and feel younger.
A single kind word will keep one warm for years.
A thrilling time is in your immediate future.
Your heart is a place to draw true happiness.
Be mischievous and you will not be lonesome.
Sometimes you just need to lay on the floor.
The greatest danger could be your stupidity.
The time is alway right to do what is right.
You will step on the soil of many countries.
Do not mistake temptation for opportunity.
Good luck is the result of good planning.
You will be invited to an exciting event.
You will have a very pleasant experience.
A friend is a present you give yourself.
A pleasant surprise is in store for you.
Fortune not found? Abort, Retry, Ignore.
The beginning of wisdom is to desire it.
The time is right to make new friends.
You're the controller of your destiny.
Good things are being said about you.
Now is the time to try something new.
Something you lost will soon turn up.
Your life will be happy and peaceful.
May life throw you a pleasant curve.
Everyone agrees. You are the best.
Express yourself Don't hold back!
Happiness comes from a good life.
You will live a long, happy life.
Do not fear what you don't know.
Happy news is on its way to you.
You will receive a fortune.
